help-file.title: MAGIC
help-file.content:
Magic is the broad category of phenomena that goes above and beyond normal mortal powers. This can range from spells with an immensely wide variety of effects to the uncanny abilities of a particular type of creature to the curative powers of a potion to the power of song, and even further, into areas as yet unexplored. Magic permeates the Realms, binding it together, but few mortals can claim to possess a working knowledge of the Art, let alone so-called "mastery."
A list of major topics discussing magic can be found under "help mystics".
